summary: ICT-focused trading journal whose main goal is validating trade models, with planned monetization via a hybrid subscription model (free tier + Pro/Elite).
architectural_notes: Use blob storage for screenshot uploads/attachments (Advanced Notes).
Defer voice notes; screenshots only for now.
Comparison tool date ranges should support predefined ranges: week, month, custom input.
Dashboard layout implementation choice left to developer discretion (grid vs reorderable list), but must support per-user saved layouts.

existing_features.title: Implement an Advanced Notes enhancement for trades by extending the existing trade reflection data to support: (a) quick tags (multi-value text tags), and (b) categorized mistake/strength labels (multi-value, two distinct categories), while keeping existing fields (notes text, mood, images) intact.

Replace the current screenshot handling that stores images as data URLs in the frontend with true blob storage in the backend canister, using stable references (IDs/URLs) stored on the Trade.images field; restrict the scope to screenshots only (no voice notes).

new_feature_requests.summary: Customizable analytics dashboard with user-configurable KPIs/charts, drag/drop ordering, hide/show toggles, and per-user saved layouts integrated with adherence/model performance/P&L/scenarios
Calendar month-grid view showing per-day P/L, adherence score, model used, tags, and notes; days clickable to open trades; integrates with notes/screenshots
Side-by-side comparison tools to compare models/sessions/setups/adherence levels/date ranges with mirrored KPIs/charts using the same analytics engine; supports predefined ranges (week/month/custom)

Advanced notes system for each trade: screenshots (via blob storage) plus quick tags and categorized mistake/strength labels; notes visible in trade detail/calendar/comparison and feed analytics filters/breakdowns
Monetization: hybrid subscription with free tier plus Pro/Elite paid tiers (freemium + tiered plans)

Add a Calendar month-grid view that aggregates trades per day and shows, for each day: total P/L, an adherence score summary, model used summary, tags summary, and notes indicator; days must be clickable to open the full list of trades for that date and allow navigation to trade details.

Add a Side-by-Side Comparison feature that allows users to compare two datasets: (a) two models, (b) two sessions, (c) two setups (as represented by models), (d) two adherence levels, or (e) two date ranges; provide predefined date range options (week, month) plus a custom start/end input; results must reuse the existing analytics computation utilities and display mirrored KPIs/charts/stat blocks.

Implement a Customizable Analytics Dashboard that lets users choose which KPI/chart modules appear on the analytics home, supports reorder (drag-and-drop or equivalent), hide/show toggles, and persists the layout per user in the backend; the modules must be powered by the existing analytics calculations (adherence, bracket outcomes, model performance, P/L, scenario-related fields already present in trades).

Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme and apply it consistently across the new Calendar, Comparison, and Dashboard customization UI (colors, typography, spacing, card styles), ensuring a polished look and clear information hierarchy without using a blue/purple-dominant palette.

projectName: Add Calendar view, dashboard customization, comparison tools, and advanced notes (screenshots-only)
